name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 21
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Aurelia - Status - March 2015
posts.description: Little over a month ago, we announced the public preview of Aurelia [http://aurelia.io/]. Since then the community has exploded and we've seen a lot of exciting things happen. Thanks to the core team and an engaged community, we've made some big improvements. We've still got a way to go yet, but the future looks great. Below we'll update you on what's happened in the last month as well as let you know what to expect next.

posts.name: Binding with Value Converters in Aurelia
posts.description: This week, Core Aurelia Team member focusing on binding, Jeremy Danyow, shows us how to leverage value converters in Aurelia.

posts.name: End-to-End Testing with Aurelia and Protractor
posts.description: This week Core Aurelia Team member in charge of testability, Vildan Softic, shows us how to write End-to-End tests with Aurelia and Protractor.

posts.name: Aurelia Q&A
posts.description: Last week Aurelia [http://aurelia.io/] was announced and we've seen a number of recurring questions crop up on twitter, email lists, forums and elsewhere. This post attempts to provide some answers.

posts.name: Introducing Aurelia
posts.description: I'm totally stoked!!! Why? Because I finally get to share Aurelia [http://aurelia.io/] with the JavaScript world. What is it you might ask? It's a next generation JavaScript client framework unlike anything else available today.
